name: Coots Goes Home
description:
Works with a controller or keyboard. (2 buttons + dpad).

Press F1 to change the control scheme to version 2.

The version 2 is easier to understand with a "double jump" on the jump button and all horizontal movement on the other button. I will make it default to the version 2 later.

The controls include a jump, slide and 3 air moves.

Made for Ludwig Jam 2023.

Music is from Lud and Schlatts Musical Emporium.

The cat sprites are derived from Elthen's 2D Pixel Art Cat Sprites.
